name: Corruption Everbled
content:
Corruption Everbled

A landscape where corruption has taken the form of a vast, bleeding wound. Primary Objectives are corruption nodes. Secondary markers are essence wells or corrupted monuments. The ground itself seems to pulse with malevolent life.


Terrain Features:

  • Corruption nodes
  • Essence wells
  • Corrupted monuments
  • Bleeding ground

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with the stench of corruption and the sound of constant dripping. The ground seems to bleed with malevolent energy, and strange lights flicker in the mist.
